title: Forum Enhancer Kit: F.E.K. 4.0
body:
[](http://i.imgur.com/kM5LKhJ.jpg)

**Note: The previous 3 versions of FEK have primarily been for NA. Just in case anybody is wondering what this is.**

**Link to NA thread:** http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/3V6I7JvK

What is FEK? Since you're familiar with what the boards look like without it, [here's what it will look like with FEK installed](http://i.imgur.com/cfLwfdB.jpg).

In short, it makes the boards appear a lot nicer by changing the formatting and allows people to have their own avatars. It also provides other new features as well. For a complete list of all features that exist, [see this post](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/eth0WWoE-forum-enhancer-kit-fek-40?comment=0000).

---

In order to use FEK, you need to first install a Script Manager for your browser.

* Google Chrome uses [Tampermonkey](https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/tampermonkey/dhdgffkkebhmkfjojejmpbldmpobfkfo?hl=en)
* Firefox uses [Greasemonkey](https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/greasemonkey/)
* Opera uses [Violentmonkey](https://addons.opera.com/en-gb/extensions/details/violent-monkey/)
* Safari uses [Tampermonkey](https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/tampermonkey/dhdgffkkebhmkfjojejmpbldmpobfkfo?hl=en)
* Internet Explorer has no suitable script managers

Once you have a Script Manager, FEK can be downloaded.

---

**Latest FEK Release:** July 27, 2015
[Click here to download the latest version of FEK!](http://videomatic3.diskstation.me/~tundrafizz/fek/FEK.user.js)

Once you have downloaded FEK, you will see it at the top of the page.

http://i.imgur.com/p19iotx.jpg[/img]

---

**Avatars** - To receive a custom avatar, simply post the image you want in this thread.

1. Your avatar must not be larger than 500 KB in size
2. Your avatar must not be inappropriate, decided by the FEK mods
3. Your avatar's format must be .gif .png .bmp .jpg/.jpeg or .webm
4. Your avatar can be any dimension, though non-square avatars will stretch

---

**Donations**

Developing FEK took an insane amount of time, and if you want to support the work I've done, donating is always nice.

Those that donate will receive a "donor badge" under their avatar for the length of time equal to one month per $1 USD donated. Currently this badge is something I need to add manually, so it may take up to 12 hours.

http://i.imgur.com/AQPcc97.jpg[/img]

For more information, click on the "Donate" tab on the FEK Panel.

http://i.imgur.com/ygue0h6.png[/img]

---

Additional Q & A can be [found in this post](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/eth0WWoE-forum-enhancer-kit-fek-40?comment=0001).

---

I will continue to work hard developing FEK, and thank you for using it!

-Tundra Fizz

replies.body:
**Q & A**

---

Q. Everything looks all messed up, what's wrong?

A. The most likely problem is that you have either have an old version of FEK where things on the server-side have drastically changed, or you have FEK 3.0 installed as well.
 

Q. How long will it take for my avatar to be uploaded?

A. That depends on when a FEK Moderator or myself sees it. We can't be watching threads 24/7 and we have our daily activities just like you, so it might take a while.
 

Q. Can't you have it so that we can upload our own avatars?

A. Yes, and we've done that in the past. People have abused it though and uploaded inappropriate and/or NSFW images which is why it needs to be done manually now.
 

Q. I found a bug, where should I report it?

A. Preferably in the [NA FEK Thread](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/3V6I7JvK), though you can still post it in the OCE/EUW/EUNE threads. I'll just probably see it earlier if you post it in NA.
 

Q. Can you make [insert feature here] possible?

A. Depends. If I can get access to a component I need for a feature I'd like to develop, then yes. There's some things that would be impossible for me to do though since some information Riot hides so it's unavailable to me.
 

Q. Why did you do decide to do all this?

A. There are two things I love and one thing I hate. I love League of Legends, I love the forums/boards, and I hate how simple and ugly it is. Since I'm pretty knowledgeable in quite a few different things like JavaScript, PHP, and SQL, I was able to put all that to work into creating the Forum Enhancer Kit so that the people who get it will have a much better experience as they browse the boards.
 

Q. What's your favorite champion and skin?

A. Fizz and Tundra Fizz respectively.

**FEK Features**

You can customize FEK to your liking and turn off some features if you don't like them by [using the Control Panel](http://i.imgur.com/OaB7AxX.jpg).
---

**Avatars and Status Icons**

[As seen in the first post](http://i.imgur.com/cfLwfdB.jpg), there are status indicators. There are many different avatar size options from 100x100 to 200x200.

---

**Fallback Avatars**

If you would rather not see a person's summoner icon if they don't have a FEK avatar, multiple options are available to replace those. Fizz's Trident, Poro, and Happy Cloud.

http://i.imgur.com/ETJQDlJ.png[/img]
http://i.imgur.com/gN3PoCe.png[/img]
http://i.imgur.com/t9RRqTp.png[/img]

---

**User Pop-up**

When you hover your mouse over somebody's avatar, a pop-up box will appear. In it will be many useful links:

* **View Profile:** Opens up their board's profile in a new window
* **View Avatar:** Opens up their FEK avatar in a new window
* **LoLNexus:** Opens up their LoLNexus page in a new window
* **OP.GG:** Opens up their op.gg page in a new window
* **Blacklist:** Adds/Removes them from your blacklist

This feature is integral to FEK and can only be disabled if you disable avatars.

http://i.imgur.com/MM0jVEx.jpg[/img]

---

**Enhanced Voting**

Hover your mouse over somebody's votes and it will display either the total votes on the post/thread, or it will show individual upvotes and downvotes. By default, the latter is selected but you can toggle it in the FEK control panel.

http://i.imgur.com/lNzShwO.png[/img]
http://i.imgur.com/Q5JYlX9.png[/img]
http://i.imgur.com/NDclSdu.png[/img]
http://i.imgur.com/Skhi8WJ.png[/img]

You also have the option to completely remove votes as well.

http://i.imgur.com/JepoVLn.png[/img]
http://i.imgur.com/XZHsPDi.jpg[/img]
http://i.imgur.com/lNH9YfK.jpg[/img]

---

**Blacklisting**

http://i.imgur.com/LqBQjn6.jpg[/img]

To blacklist somebody, hover your mouse over their avatar and click on the "Blacklist" link.
http://i.imgur.com/P5AAevZ.gif[/img]

You will receive an alert.
http://i.imgur.com/tIqUlIH.png[/img]

Click on the "Blacklist" tab on the FEK control panel to view the people you have blacklisted. BEING ABLE TO BLACKLIST YOURSELF, WHILE SILLY, IS INTENTIONAL!
http://i.imgur.com/ncpCHkn.png[/img]

---

**OP Style Change**

By having this on, it removes the "style" of the original poster's posts.

http://i.imgur.com/aWBBBJ6.jpg[/img]
http://i.imgur.com/AdRMVxn.jpg[/img]

---

**Enhanced Thread Preview**

When you hover your mouse over a thread, a new popup box now appears instantly. Furthermore, champion/item/summoner icons are now displayed as well so you no longer have to see something like \{{champion:105}} 

http://i.imgur.com/AneV3d3.png[/img]
http://i.imgur.com/YELdMpM.jpg[/img]
http://i.imgur.com/1Zsteqx.png[/img]

---

**Thread Highlighting**

Threads you make will be highlighted in a different color so you can see them easier. Below, a thread I made has a black background.

http://i.imgur.com/83yrh32.jpg[/img]

---

**Boards Dropdown Menu**

By hovering your mouse over "Boards" at the top, a dropdown navbar will appear.

http://i.imgur.com/yzYIr2F.jpg[/img]

---

**Animated Thumbnails**

http://i.imgur.com/LVUrGkC.gif[/img]
http://i.imgur.com/ftgb7vr.gif[/img]
http://i.imgur.com/SMw8Mf0.gif[/img]
http://i.imgur.com/1NdpRHr.gif[/img]


You can also hide thumbnail previews if you want.

http://i.imgur.com/jcg9uVp.png[/img]

BEFORE
http://i.imgur.com/nzDJznR.png[/img]

AFTER
http://i.imgur.com/EYjAJo3.png[/img]

---

**Sticky Navbar**

With this option enabled, the navigation bar will always be at the top of the screen.

http://i.imgur.com/VqayMBQ.jpg[/img]

---

**Media Embedding**

.webms will no longer show up as a link, and instead be embedded.

In addition to this, YouTube videos will also automatically be embedded.

http://i.imgur.com/9WfilTz.jpg[/img]

---

**Rioters**

Rioters have their titles displayed underneath them.

http://i.imgur.com/NDclSdu.png[/img]

---

**Known bugs**

* Original poster's votes get displaced when the thread's title is too long

CORRECT
http://i.imgur.com/hTqxaCT.jpg[/img]

BUG
http://i.imgur.com/vDKbskJ.jpg[/img]

* Some people's status icons always show as "away" due to a timezone issue.

---

**Click the link below to download the latest version of FEK.**

http://videomatic3.diskstation.me/~tundrafizz/fek/FEK.user.js
